item.title: Tade Thompson, Rosewater
item.description: Rosewater is an exciting science fiction novel set several decades after first contact with an alien called Wormwood, that has established itself as a large biodome in Nigeria. The novel follows Kaaro, a thief whose extra special abilities are forged from an unlikely connection with the alien. The whole thing is part sci-fi adventure and part spy novel. The novel is set in multiple timelines with whole sections of the story told in flashback.
